description.value:
You draw upon the vitality of nearby life to fuel your magic, heedless of the harm you cause to the land and your allies.

At-Will âœ¦ Arcane, Necrotic

Free Action • Personal

Trigger: You make an attack roll or a damage roll as part of an arcane daily attack power.

Effect: You can reroll the triggering roll but must use the second result. In addition, each ally (willing or unwilling) within 20 squares of you takes necrotic amage equal to half his or her healing surge value. This damage ignores immunities and cannot be reduced in any way.

Special: You can use this effect once for any arcane daily attack power you use, affecting any single attack roll or the damage roll for that power.

Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 80.
